Bloomington.Fell Arboretum:
The Fell Arboretum is an arboretum located across the campus of Illinois State University in Normal, Illinois.
The arboretum began in 1867 when Jesse W. Fell, the university's founder, obtained $3,000 from the state legislature for campus landscaping. He planted 1,740 trees on campus that year and 107 trees the following year.
